name: Finish The Lyric!
description:
Test your knowledge of System Of A Down's lyrics in this game!

Each time you play, you will be given a random set of SOAD lyric fragments to complete. Points will be given for each right answer. If you get the lyric wrong twice, you will not receive a point.  Every song from System's discog is included! (plus a sorta hidden bonus round containing lyrics from a very special unreleased album...)

There are different endings depending on how many points you earn. There are four endings in the main game, and three endings in the bonus round. Good luck!
